nodes.text: A small, flying species was native to Garqi, an agriworld in the Cassander sector. The species was small; less than the size of a young Human's hand. It had a segmented body of a pinkish coloration and four jointed legs. It had two pointed wings on the top of its body, with which it could fly. Groups of these creatures could be found in the yellow fields of Garqi.
This species appears in an illustration by Langdon Foss that was published by Wizards of the Coast in Geonosis and the Outer Rim Worlds in 2004.
